subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Marlins catcher Miguel Olivo, who started a benches-clearing brawl in the bottom of the fifth inning when he charged toward the Mets’ José Reyes, said that the fight was not over.
snippet: Marlins catcher Miguel Olivo, who started a benches-clearing brawl in the bottom of the fifth inning when he charged toward the Mets’ José Reyes, said that the fight was not over.
